00012 void Photo::PrintOption(ostream& os)
00013 {
00014         if (prevPost != 0)
00015                 os<<"- Go to previous post [p]"<<endl;
00016         if (nextPost != 0)
00017                 os<<"- Go to next post [n]"<<endl;
00018         os<<"- Quit browsing [q]"<<endl;
00019 }
00020 
00021 Post* Photo::ExecuteOption(string& option, Post* p)
00022 {
00023         if (option == "p" && prevPost != 0) return prevPost;
00024         else if (option == "n" && nextPost != 0) return nextPost;
00025         else if (option == "q") return 0;
00026         else return p;
00027 }
